description.brief: Collection of ROS GUI tools and libraries
description.p: rxtools is two things. First it is a library of GUI widgets, written in wxWidgets, that can be embedded in other applications. Second, it is a set of GUI applications that view and manage ROS state. These GUI applications include rxconsole and rxplot.
Pieces of rxtools use some icons from the Silk icon pack from famfamfam.

package.author: Josh Faust, Rob Wheeler, Ken Conley
